com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game

Class ThirtyOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.Gameplay
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.ThirtyOne

  • public class ThirtyOne
extends Gameplay
    This class describes the game rules and sequence for the game "Thirty-One".
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergius Maier

      • winner

        private Player winner
        The player who has won the round.

      • choice

        private Card[] choice
        The hidden cards that the dealer will get if he refuses his hand cards. If the dealer accepts his hand cards, these will become the table cards.

      • playing

        private boolean playing
        Flag to indicate if the game is still in progress.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThirtyOne

        public ThirtyOne(int pPlayerCount)
        Construct a new game of "Thirty-One".
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public final void start()
        Set a random player to be the dealer and start the game.

      • startRound

        public final void startRound()
        The start of a game round.
        All players receive their hand cards and the dealer has to choose between two card sets of which he sees only one.

      • playRound

        private void playRound()
        Game sequence.
        All players are successively tuned till an active player finishes the round. All other players get the possibility to do one last action.

      • endRound

        public final void endRound()
        End of a round.
        Gets one or more players with the lowest score. These players lose a life. Either there is a winner, a draw or the players are removed from the game, who have no life and it starts a new round/game.

      • giveHand

        public final void giveHand(Player p)
        Player p takes 3 Cards from deck and add it to his hand.
        Parameters:
        p - Player who gets cards from deck to his hand

      • choice

        private void choice()
        Creates a second hand of cards for the dealer.

      • countLivingPlayers

        public final int countLivingPlayers()
        Count the number of players with lifes.
        Returns:
        The number of living players left

        Parameters:

        msg - Incoming message

      • choiceResult

        private void choiceResult(java.lang.String str)
        Evaluation of the dealer's choice at the beginning of a round. If dealer choose hand the hidden cards would lay down on the table. Otherwise the dealer gets the hidden cards and the dealer's hand would lay down on the table.
        Parameters:
        str - Choice made by the dealer

      • updateTables

        private void updateTables()
        Send a broadcast to all players to update the cards on the table.

      • updateHand

        private void updateHand(Player p)
        Send a message to the current player with his new hand cards.
        Parameters:
        p - The player who should receive new hand cards

      • newGame

        private void newGame()
        Preparation for a new game. (new dealer, all players get max lifes)
